analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/47/0x2883559ab95de4ac617cdcf777ea23c852ccdc33.sol:
	Contract JellyToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/47/0x2883559ab95de4ac617cdcf777ea23c852ccdc33.sol#221)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/47/0x2883559ab95de4ac617cdcf777ea23c852ccdc33.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/47/0x2883559ab95de4ac617cdcf777ea23c852ccdc33.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/47/0x2883559ab95de4ac617cdcf777ea23c852ccdc33.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
